page.title: 04POPULATION
page.content: The prospects for{population growth look{pretty bleak}in these figures.40% are over retirement age,and there isn't anybody under the age of 5.The area has just{35 people}living in it,and much of this must be due to the isolation of this area from the rest of the island,though with cars this need not apply today. People make a living by{farming,}even though there are just 10 males suitable for this. { Many houses}are{empty}in this area,and with the influx to the island of people trying to escape from the "rat race" in the towns we could yet see a population increase.At this moment,however,the community remains very small.
